title: Flame of Persia
brief_description: A historical, geographical and descriptive account of Persia/Iran including the celebration of 25 centuries of monarchy. Depicts the Shah of Iran discussing Persian industry and pride. Narrated by Orson Welles.
description: A historical, geographical and descriptive account of Persia/Iran including the celebration of 25 centuries of monarchy. Depicts the Shah of Iran discussing Persian industry and pride. Narrated by Orson Welles.
